A

addRandomLabel(RandomLabel) - Method in class moj.ri.RandomIndex
Add an existing RandomLabel to the RandomIndex.
addText(String[]) - Method in class moj.ri.RandomIndex
Add text to the Random Index and contextually update all words in, and added to, the index.
addText(String, String) - Method in class moj.ri.RandomIndex
Add text to the Random Index and contextually update all words in, and added to, the index, tokens are separated according to the supplied pattern.
addText(String) - Method in class moj.ri.RandomIndex
Add text to the Random Index and contextually update all words in, and added to, the index, tokens are separated by white-space.
addTextFromFile(String) - Method in class moj.ri.SparseDistributedMemory
Adds text from a text file to the RandomIndex, i.e. the text in the text file is read and words, in the order they are encountered in the text, are added to the RandomIndex if they aren't already represented in the index and contextually updated if they are already present.
applyLeftWeighting(RandomLabel, int, RandomLabel) - Method in class moj.ri.weighting.MangesWS
Calculates the weight based upon the distance (in the left context) to the current label in the following manner: weight=(2^(1-distance to focus word)).
applyLeftWeighting(RandomLabel, int, RandomLabel) - Method in class moj.ri.weighting.MartinsWCWS
Calculates the weight based upon the distance (in the left context) to the current label in the following manner: weight=(1/distance to focus word)
applyLeftWeighting(RandomLabel, int, RandomLabel) - Method in class moj.ri.weighting.MartinsWS
Calculates the weight based upon the distance (in the left context) to the current label in the following manner: weight=(1/distance to focus word)
applyLeftWeighting(RandomLabel, int, RandomLabel) - Method in class moj.ri.weighting.RosellsWS
 
applyLeftWeighting(RandomLabel, int, RandomLabel) - Method in class moj.ri.weighting.WeightingScheme
Calculates the weight based upon the distance (in the left context) to the current label.
applyRightWeighting(RandomLabel, int, RandomLabel) - Method in class moj.ri.weighting.MangesWS
Calculates the weight based upon the distance (in the right context) to the current label in the following manner: weight=(2^(1-distance to focus word)).
applyRightWeighting(RandomLabel, int, RandomLabel) - Method in class moj.ri.weighting.MartinsWCWS
Calculates the weight based upon the distance (in the right context) to the current label in the following manner: weight=(1/distance to focus word)
applyRightWeighting(RandomLabel, int, RandomLabel) - Method in class moj.ri.weighting.MartinsWS
Calculates the weight based upon the distance (in the right context) to the current label in the following manner: weight=(1/distance to focus word)
applyRightWeighting(RandomLabel, int, RandomLabel) - Method in class moj.ri.weighting.RosellsWS
 
applyRightWeighting(RandomLabel, int, RandomLabel) - Method in class moj.ri.weighting.WeightingScheme
Calculates the weight based upon the distance (in the right context) to the current label.
